Mandate: Promote transparency, expose corruption, and support civil society oversight of revenue and justice institutions.
TopPriorities: Track public procurement and VAT refund transparency.
Mobilize citizen reporters to document suspicious public spending.
Push for stronger asset declaration laws and whistleblower protection.
ActiveOperations: Integrity monitoring surveys assessing perceptions of institutional fairness.
Partnerships with media to surface corruption networks.
Legal aid for complainants preparing submissions to ACC and courts.

RecentActions.Title: Released transparency report
RecentActions.Summary: Published findings on procurement processes and compliance gaps.

RecentActions.Title: Civic monitoring initiative
RecentActions.Summary: Organized community engagement to track government accountability.

RecentActions.Title: Civic monitoring initiative
RecentActions.Summary: Organized community engagement to track government accountability.

KeyPartnerships: Economic and Financial Crimes Court observers

Mandate: Promote transparency, expose corruption, and support civil society oversight of revenue and justice institutions.
TopPriorities: Track public procurement and VAT refund transparency.
Mobilize citizen reporters to document suspicious public spending.
Push for stronger asset declaration laws and whistleblower protection.
ActiveOperations: Integrity monitoring surveys assessing perceptions of institutional fairness.
Partnerships with media to surface corruption networks.
Legal aid for complainants preparing submissions to ACC and courts.
